com.st.st25sdk.ndef

Class NDEFMsg

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.st.st25sdk.ndef.NDEFMsg
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class NDEFMsg
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Class describing the content of one NDEF message This NDEF message can contain a one or several NDEF records
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
